summary: A documentary about militant student political activity in the University of California-Berkely in the 1960's.
cast: Jentri Anders|Joan Baez|Frank Bardacke|Stokely Carmichael|John De Bonis|Hardy Frye|John Gage|Allen Ginsberg|Todd Gitlin|Jackie Goldberg|Grateful Dead|Susan Griffin|David Hilliard|Lyndon B. Johnson|Clark Kerr|Martin Luther King|Barry Melton|Mike Miller|Robert Mitchum|Suzy Nelson|Huey P. Newton|Phil Ochs|Paul Potter|Max Rafferty|Ronald Reagan|James Rector|Ruth Rosen|Michael Rossman|Mario Savio|Bobby Seale|John Searle|Francis E. Walter|Jack Weinberg|Edwin E. Willis|Nancy Reagan
title: Berkeley in the Sixties
